bibl.title: Stamped Amphora Handles Found in the Rescue Excavations of CEAlex in Alexandria.
bibl.note: Excavations of the Centre d'Études alexandrines, 1992-2002, in different quarters of Ptolemaic Alexandria. - 1706 stamped amphora handles (1293 Rhodian).

bibl.title: Amphores d'Égypte de la Basse Époque à l'époque arabe

bibl.seg: CANKARDES-SENOL Gonca, Stamped Amphora Handles Found in the Rescue Excavations of CEAlex in Alexandria.

Sylvie MARCHAND et Antigone MARANGOU (Édd.), Amphores d'Égypte de la Basse Époque à l'époque arabe = Cahiers de la céramique égyptienne 8 (2007) I, pp. 33-56, 2 tabl., 2 diagrammes, 31 figg., 2 cartes.
Excavations of the Centre d'Études alexandrines, 1992-2002, in different quarters of Ptolemaic Alexandria. - 1706 stamped amphora handles (1293 Rhodian).
